snippet.title: Sunburnt - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description: A heated challenge in stunning 1-bit comes as a spiritual successor to Light Strike. The shaded oasis was but a moment's respite from the deadly sun that sits just above you; how long can you survive? Now available for Windows and Macintosh computers.
